title: Inform Authority about reaching relevant stage of work where stage-wise approval from the authority is required
clause_text: Inform Authority about reaching relevant stage of work where stage-wise approval from the authority is required. Issue completion / part completion certificate for submission to the authority. Inform in writing to the Authority in case of violation by Client during the period of appointment

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Inform Authority about reaching relevant stage of work where stage-wise approval from the authority is required.
